introduction: Thank you for starting a sporting goods hunt with Maven! We are locating a sports expert to shop for you. While we're doing that, we have a few questions. And, we'll pass along your answers once the right maven is assigned.

questions.question: For which sport are you shopping?
What specific product within the sport?
Are you partial to a brand(s)?
Any additional details that would be useful for the Maven to know?
What price range do you have in mind?

introduction: Thank you for starting a hunt for baby items with Maven!  We love shopping for babies! We are locating a baby expert to shop for you. While we're doing that, we have a few questions. And, we'll pass along your answers once the right maven is assigned.

questions.question: In what type of baby product are you interested?
Is the child a boy or girl?
What age is the infant / toddler?
Any additional details that would be useful for the Maven to know?
What price range do you have in mind?

introduction: Thank you for starting a hunt with Maven! We have a few questions so that we can assign the right shopping expert for you. And, we'll pass along your answers once the right maven is assigned.

questions.question: Tell us what you are shopping for?
Is there a particular size or specification needed?
If this is a taste oriented item, tell us a little about your likes and dislikes?
Any additional details that would be useful for the Maven to know?
What price range do you have in mind?

introduction: Thank you for starting a hunt at Maven!  We will find that perfect gift to make this Valentine's Day very special.  While we are locating a shopping expert for your hunt, we have a few questions. And, we'll pass along your answers once the right maven is assigned.

questions.question: Who are you shopping for?
What is their gender and approximate age?
Did you have a type of present in mind that you know the gift recipient would love?
What are their interests, hobbies, and/or favorite activities?
What price range do you have in mind?

introduction: Thank you for connecting via Maven!  We have notified your Maven that you've started a hunt and especially requested them!

questions.question: As we wait for them to pickup, any details or questions you can share?
Do you have something specific already in mind??
Any favorite colors, fragrances, flavors, etc.?
Is there any timeline we are dealing with?  Need by date??
What price range do you have in mind?

introduction: Thank you for starting an electronics hunt with us!  We are locating an electronics expert to help you find the perfect item. While we're doing that, we have a few questions for you.  And, we'll pass along your answers once the right maven is assigned.

questions.question: What kind of electronics product are you looking for?  For example, a computer, a television or something else?
Are there particular electronics brands that you prefer?
What features must the item have in order to meet your needs, such as a particular size or features?
What is the most important thing to you about the product you're looking for, such as features, price, brand or something else?
What price range do you have in mind?

introduction: Thank you for starting a gift hunt...our mavens love gift shopping!  We are locating a maven to help you find the perfect gift.  While we're doing that, we have a few questions for you.  And, we'll pass along your answers once the right maven is assigned.

questions.question: Who are you giving the gift to?
What is the occasion?
Can you tell us a little about this person - interests, hobbies, or the kinds of things this person finds appealing?
Are there any other details that would be useful for the Maven to know when shopping for the perfect present?
What price range do you have in mind?

introduction: Thank you for starting a home & kitchen hunt. We are locating a home expert to shop for you. While we're doing that, we have a few questions. And, we'll pass along your answers once the right maven is assigned.

questions.question: For which room in the house are you shopping?
What product within the room?
Can you tell us specifics existing decor in the room, colors to coordinate with or brand preferences?
Any additional details that would be useful for the Maven to know so that they find the perfect item?
What price range do you have in mind?
